name: reFLEX test (ROYYOR LLC)
description:
A short game where you can FLEX your reflexes. In the game you use the mouse to aim at targets. Then left click to shoot as many as you can. After each round the window of time to shoot a target decreases. The higher your score the better your overall reaction time

Even though this is a short little game we are still open to hear what you think about the game so feel free to comment anything you like.  Reporting any bugs or problems with the game is also welcome.

(Full screen in browser is recommended for best results)
